  • 方法详细资料

    • getCustom

      public long getCustom​(String metric)
      从接口复制的说明: ScanMetrics
      Get the value of a custom counter. Only the effects of prior calls to ScanMetrics.incrementCustom(String) and ScanMetrics.incrementCustom(String, long) should be observable through this method, never the effects of prior calls to ScanMetrics.increment(org.janusgraph.diskstorage.keycolumnvalue.scan.ScanMetrics.Metric).
      指定者:
      getCustom 在接口中 ScanMetrics
      返回:

    • incrementCustom

      public void incrementCustom​(String metric, long delta)
      从接口复制的说明: ScanMetrics
      Increment a custom counter by delta. The effects of calls to method should only be observable through ScanMetrics.getCustom(String), never through ScanMetrics.get(org.janusgraph.diskstorage.keycolumnvalue.scan.ScanMetrics.Metric).
      指定者:
      incrementCustom 在接口中 ScanMetrics
      参数:
      metric - the name of the counter
      delta - the amount to add to the counter

    • incrementCustom

      public void incrementCustom​(String metric)
      从接口复制的说明: ScanMetrics
      Like ScanMetrics.incrementCustom(String, long), except the delta is 1.
      指定者:
      incrementCustom 在接口中 ScanMetrics
      参数:
      metric - the name of the counter to increment by 1

    • get

      public long get​(ScanMetrics.Metric metric)
      从接口复制的说明: ScanMetrics
      Get the value of a standard counter.
      指定者:
      get 在接口中 ScanMetrics
      参数:
      metric - the standard counter whose value should be returned
      返回:
      the value of the standard counter

    • increment

      public void increment​(ScanMetrics.Metric metric)
      从接口复制的说明: ScanMetrics
      Increment a standard counter by 1.
      指定者:
      increment 在接口中 ScanMetrics
      参数:
      metric - the standard counter whose value will be increased by 1
